Inside the fast rise and faster collapse of the acclaimed Auckland K Road restaurant Cotto https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/inside-the-fast-rise-and-faster-collapse-of-the-acclaimed-auckland-k-road-restaurant-cotto/ML63HFNF7RDFPPDV4U4QDNEIF4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/inside-the-fast-rise-and-faster-collapse-of-the-acclaimed-auckland-k-road-restaurant-cotto/ML63HFNF7RDFPPDV4U4QDNEIF4/ Stewart Sowman-LundThe popular spot closed its doors with no warning in late 2023.
